channel.title: [PI] Shops

item.title: [PI] Shops
item.dc:creator: @PvPXile PvPXile
item.description:
@PvPXile wrote:

[quote=“blddyboy, post:1, topic:447531”]I want a shop to accept a item other than coins. If you could check over my code and see if it could be improved to make it accept it.

[code]if(c.myShopId == 33) {
if (c.playerItems >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(12852, c.getItems().getItemSlot(12852), getSpecialItemValue(itemID));
c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You don’t have enough space in your inventory.”);

					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough fist of guthix tokens.");
					
				}[/code]

Can Someone help me figure this out?[/quote]

It’s fine…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shops
item.dc:creator: @blddyboy blddyboy
item.description:
@blddyboy wrote:

I want a shop to accept a item other than coins. If you could check over my code and see if it could be improved to make it accept it.

[code]if(c.myShopId == 33) {
if (c.playerItems >= getSpecialItemValue(itemID)) {
if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
c.getItems().deleteItem(12852, c.getItems().getItemSlot(12852), getSpecialItemValue(itemID));
c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
}
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You don’t have enough space in your inventory.”);

					}
				} else {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough fist of guthix tokens.");
					
				}[/code]

Can Someone help me figure this out?

Read full topic
